entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:23 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 5.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 8:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 5.7°C

Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 98 %

Wind: S 21 km/h

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
